snippet: After she shot the premiere of the new season of her TV show “Covert Affairs” in the South American metropolis, the actress thanked the folks who helped her out by staging an outdoor screening of the episode.
lead_paragraph: After she shot the premiere of the new season of her TV show “Covert Affairs” in the South American metropolis, the actress thanked the folks who helped her out by staging an outdoor screening of the episode.

headline.main: Piper Perabo’s Party for the Residents of Medellín, Colombia
